text: wama khlaqna alsmwat wal'ard wama baynahuma 'iilaa bialhaqi daltyn ealaa kamal khalqhma waqtdarh, wa'anah aldhy la tnbghy alebadt 'iilaa lah wahdah la sharik lh. wa'iina alsaaeat alty taqum fiha alqiamat latiat laa mhalt; ltwffa kulu nafs bima emlt, faef -ayha alrswl- ean almshrkyn, wasfah eanhum watajawuz eamaa yfelwnh
